description.value:
Your breath becomes even more powerful. The damage dice of your breath weapon increases to [[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d8]]{1d8 leveled damage} and you increase the breath's area to a @Template[type:line|distance:60] breath weapon or a @Template[type:cone|distance:30].

Â 

If you have the @UUID[Compendium.aedenir-homebrew.aed-featsfeatures.Item.F79pBXd0KaORJyax]{Powerful Breath} feat, your breath's damage dice increases to [[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d10]]{1d10 leveled damage} and the area increases to a @Template[type:line|distance:90] breath weapon or a @Template[type:cone|distance:45] when intensifying your breath. You still can't use your breath weapon again for 1 hour if you do.
